meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Greg Seroka Ellen Burgett Michael Brady Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7054.

td.p: Greg Seroka, a chef from Steamboat Springs, Colorado
Ellen Burgett, a technical writer from Brighton, Michigan
Michael Brady, a user experience designer from Norwood, Massachusetts (whose 2-day cash winnings total $33,602)

tr.td: IN THE PANTHEON
AIRPORTS
PLEASED TO MEAT YOU
SCIENCE TERMS IN FRENCH
(Alex: En français.)
5-LETTER "W"ORDS
I'M ALL ABOUT THAT BASSIST

tr.td: Michael
Ellen
Greg
IN THE PANTHEON
(Alex: Once again, you are [*], but this time, each correct response will be made up of letters in the word "pantheon" itself.)
THE CALENDAR
MOVIE & TV TERMS
BOLIVIA YOU ME
NONFICTION
THE LAST TIME THE CUBS WON THE WORLD SERIES
(Alex: No one is alive to remember that, I think.)
